title: Office Manager
content:
About the role
Reporting to the CEO, the Office Manager (part-time) will be responsible for helping to setup and run Chalk’s workplace. You will play a critical role within the organization by helping the company to operate seamlessly and supporting the team to reach peak performance. This is your opportunity to join us in-person as an early employee and make a visible impact at a high growth start-up.
What you will do

Open the office each morning and make sure we’re ready to kick off the day
Greet visitors, interview candidates, and customers
Keep the office stocked with supplies, meals, snacks, drinks and everything we need to keep our team happy and operating at a high level
Select vendors, negotiate contracts, and onboard new suppliers
Plan team events and offsites
Assist with administrative tasks, scheduling, and general support for Chalk’s Co-Founders

What we’re looking for

Excellent written and verbal communication
Outgoing and personable
Scrappy, problem-solving and hard working

Bonus points

Experience working at a startup
Experience on a workplace team
Experience working closely with engineering teams

Inclusivity
Chalk is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and inclusion and provide reasonable accommodations to anyone in need of individualized support.
